annotations.title: A Latin American Inspired Cocktail And Calling Marius Out!

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Espadin Mezcal 
.75oz (22.5ml) Lillet Blanc
.5oz (15ml) Dolin Dry Vermouth
.25oz (7.5ml) Yellow Chartreuse
2 Dashes Peychauds Bitters
1 Tsp Maraschino Liqueur
Grapefruit Twist

Stir over ice and strain into rocks glass over large ice cube. 
Garnish with grapefruit twist. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=51gh5H3IPAg
title: Arinato
